website_summaries.verdict: An illustrated and often hilarious “real world” pro-tips that will save you time, money, and sanity.
pros: A great gift for first-time parents that provides sensible, practical tips to make parenting easier
Easy to read with pictures, which is ideal for sleepy or harried parents
Clever and useful “hacks” cover pregnancy, newborns, and young children
Liked for its non-judgmental, guilt-free tone
cons: A little too cutesy for some reviewers who easily find these tips on the internet

customer_reviews.title: Very good book for new mothers/fathers.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a new-mom to be. The book came fast which was great because it was a last minute decision to buy it. I couldn't help but read through a great deal of it. It is such a cute book and wish I would have had this when I was a new mom!
customer_reviews.author: BettyB

customer_reviews.title: Easy read and useful
customer_reviews.text: This was great but I only wish I got a kindle version. Easy read and useful hacks from day one. A book you keep for a long time as some hacks are for when baby becomes toddler.
customer_reviews.author: graphitegray

customer_reviews.title: Funny Advice and Humorous Illustrations for Parents (and New Expecting Parents)!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this book! I had checked it out at our local library because the cover caught my attention, it had a bunch of great ideas for life with kids. I ended up ordering it to keep on hand for myself and gifted 3 more copies to new moms which they all appreciated it equally as much, and got a good little laugh at the humorous illustrations.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Dusel

customer_reviews.title: First time parent must have
customer_reviews.text: Some great tips for first time parents. Will use this book years to come. Thankful other parents passed down their knowledge on us newbies
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: I think they're gonna love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my son's first child, my first grandchild. After looking through the book, I kinda wish I had this around when I had mu 2 kids. Lots of neat tricks and stuff in here that will definitely help in a pinch,especially if you don't hav eall the "stuff" they have for babies today. I think they're gonna love it!
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: I found only 5 of the 134 shortcuts useful. Most are obvious
customer_reviews.text: I found only 5 of the 134 shortcuts useful. Most are obvious, impractical, or silly. Wished that it would have been more useful.
customer_reviews.author: General Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tips for all parents!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Asha's podcast "Edit Your Life" and her book brings her same sensibility and practicality to this book. I love the quick tips to make parenting easier - as well as the permission she gives all of us to allow us to use these tips. There is no guilt or judgment, just common sense that we should all do what makes sense and stop making life harder than it needs to be. Highly recommend this to all parents!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fun read and great hacks every parent can appreciate!
customer_reviews.text: This book was a gift from my Dad as he enjoys watching me raise two active little girls. I loved reading this. It was funny and a very quick read because it was entertaining and practical. I loved the fact that I had done some of the hacks on my own and made notes of new ones to try. I highly recommend this for all parents, it's a lot of fun....and we could all use a little fun!
customer_reviews.author: BU

customer_reviews.title: Hacking the parent matrix
customer_reviews.text: This was hilarious. Pictures make books better, and in this case, takes it from "oh, good to know!" to truly epic FTW. In case my review sounds too good to be true, I bought the softcopy with my own money, no discount, and plan on getting this in hardcopy as a visual reminder that parenting can be fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Read!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this book to support my vlog I started for what to do with the things around your home during COVID! Excellent book that was easy to read and categorized!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Cool stuff and nice little tips that I wouldn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift for my buddy who just had a child. I skimmed through this after hearing about it on NPR. Cool stuff and nice little tips that I wouldn't have thought of with a young child. Great conversation piece as well!
customer_reviews.author: T Holleman

customer_reviews.title: Great book for new Parents
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for new parents to be. Heck I even read it and loved it and I have no kids. some hacks are pretty cool and interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Things you never thought of!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book. Lots of great tricks for parents. Some will come in handy with our newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T Malanowski

customer_reviews.title: The women attending the shower had not heard of such a thing and wondered why they hadn't thought of it because it was so brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: This is a practical book. I recently gave it as a shower gift with the materials needed for the bed lasagna. The women attending the shower had not heard of such a thing and wondered why they hadn't thought of it because it was so brilliant!

customer_reviews.title: This is the best! My wife and I would have enjoyed this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! My wife and I would have enjoyed this when we were new parents. I've sent copies to my children with their own small children and given copies as gifts to young couples who have just had a child. The book gets rave reviews
customer_reviews.author: John Hume

customer_reviews.title: A fun gift for new parents
customer_reviews.text: A fun gift for new parents. I bought two, as gifts to friends who had recently had babies, and they loved the ideas inside.
customer_reviews.author: Soupy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book for parents of small children. I've given away several copies now!

customer_reviews.title: Good ideas
customer_reviews.text: This book has many clever ideas I hadn't thought of.

customer_reviews.title: Funny! New parents enjoyed this book and found some ...
customer_reviews.text: Funny! New parents enjoyed this book and found some helpful hints.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best from the Website
customer_reviews.text: I got a copy of this book for myself after being a long time fan of the Parent Hacks website. I was so delighted by the tips in the book and the illustrations that this is now my go-to gift for new parents.
customer_reviews.author: K Dub

customer_reviews.title: Great Tips, Easy Read!
customer_reviews.text: This book is full of great tips, is easy to read, and the illustrations are perfect! I'll be buying this book for all new parents for sure!
customer_reviews.author: S Carr-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for today's parents
customer_reviews.text: Gave this our two daughters-in-law and daughter for Christmas, all raising young children. They liked it lots; easy to read and look things up, perfect for busy parents.
customer_reviews.author: Janice W

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Helpful
customer_reviews.text: The majority of the content is unique and actually doable. All solutions are cost-effective and minimalistic. Very helpful to have info compiled— much quicker than a google search!
customer_reviews.author: ERom

customer_reviews.title: Great ideas
customer_reviews.text: Fun book. Wish I had this book when i was pregnant 6 years ago
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: and his parents found good ideas, and so did our nephew and his ...
customer_reviews.text: This book offered clever and imaginative ideas for new parents. Our own grandson is 3, and his parents found good ideas, and so did our nephew and his wife who have a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Miller

customer_reviews.title: Buy this book!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun read and full of nifty tricks I'd never thought of. Plus, it triggered many other ideas to make parenting even more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Simon Eponym

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing genius here but enough good ideas to make it worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: So useful and creatively clever
customer_reviews.text: Has come in handy so many times. So useful and creatively clever!

customer_reviews.title: Great tips in here
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this book for 2 different baby showers, and also got one for myself. Great tips in here!

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The book was funny and insightful. I don't think I've ever used so many bookmarks on my kindle - lots of good stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Great book, great tips.
customer_reviews.text: Fun book, great tips. Very useful. Makes a great gift too.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ideas for young families.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter in law who is expecting her first baby. Has several great ideas to save time and make things easier.

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Some of the hacks you've seen before in other publications, but some were really helpful.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This book is a must have for folks new to parenting as well as seasoned veterans.

customer_reviews.title: Parent Hacks is a great gift for new and old parents!
customer_reviews.text: Such ingenious ideas! Great for new parents, old parents and grandparents!
customer_reviews.author: carriek333

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great book, even if you use just a few of their suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. I frequently read it while my son is in timeout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great book for new parents, recommended to many of my friends

customer_reviews.title: Useful! Most of these I have actually heard of ...
customer_reviews.text: Useful! Most of these I have actually heard of other places on the web but there were a few new ones that I found useful.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this is a baby shower gift to a father, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: lisa.nez

customer_reviews.title: A "must read" for new parents.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my son and his wife. I read it while they were moving house and I think it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Witty and enjoyable. No preaching tones, instead short sentences perfectly suited for the busy parent.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Martin

customer_reviews.title: This book is the *perfect* baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: What great ideas, like "Serve samples of new foods in an ice-cube tray" and "Use a shot glass as a toddler drinking glass" (great way to wean them off sippy cups... This book makes for a *perfect* baby shower gift. As a SAHD who raised his two kids, these kinds of no-nonsense hacks are a welcome bit of assistance. The author's voice is accessible and bs-free. No pretense, no bologna. And the illustrations are also unpretentious, simple and warm, and effective... This really is a book that belongs on every baby shower registry.
customer_reviews.author: Stu Mark

customer_reviews.title: This book gives awesome ideas for any age children
customer_reviews.text: i have a toddler and preschooler and even though this book has infant and pregnancy info I still learned a lot from it such as all the possibilities to do with a wipe! This book gives awesome ideas for any age children.
customer_reviews.author: C Pernock

customer_reviews.title: It's just better as an online thing
customer_reviews.text: While I'm glad she compiled this best-of list for the parents out there who don't want to be checking the internet for new hacks, really the best format the author's collection is online. I prefer real-life photos to the illustrations in the book, and I feel best following parent hackers in social media, knowing I am up-to-date with the latest and greatest of innovative ideas. The author does provide very useful summaries with her top-5 and top-10- type lists, as well as grouping together multiple hacks for a single household item. Definitely useful stuff, I just prefer it in her website. (and not just because it's free, it's just a great format for me)
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Hogg

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for parents or even folks with no kids.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first copy for new parent friends. Got to reading it, and flagging lots of the great ideas for my own use. But I'm well past childbearing years. Ended up keeping the first copy, and buying a second for new parent friends. Really handy book. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: LuciaLoosh

customer_reviews.title: There are a lot of excellent tips in this book!
customer_reviews.text: It is totally worth it!, I am implementing a lot of them with my nine month little one. Thank you Parent Hacks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marysun R.

customer_reviews.title: Gifted to ...
customer_reviews.text: Holiday Gift for my Nephew & his wife, they have used some "Hacks" already
customer_reviews.author: sebness

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Clever
customer_reviews.text: Fun! Clever! I've been waiting for this book for a long time. A whole lotta, "why didn't I think of that?!" Kind of idears. I've already used a few! I Just wish there were 1,000 more! Felt like I flipped through it fast. More please!!
customer_reviews.author: sheila saputo

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I wish this book existed when my first child was born. Brilliant!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The tips offered in this book can be easily found on Pinterest. I would say save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: All in all, this is a great replacement item for Hygeia pumps for those looking for smaller flanges. Expect some extra noise from the tubing and duck bill valves, nothing too irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Shotko

customer_reviews.title: Parents Hacks:134 Genius Shortcuts.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. I did not get any responses in regard to the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Book trader
